# positioning Demos

## Diagonal Placement

Sprites placed in a diagonal pattern across the grid.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "pos_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_red", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_green", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_blue", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "diagonal_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R..", ".G.", "..B"]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "corner_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R.G", "...", "B.."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "grid_fill", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {"R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green"}, "layers": [{"map": ["RGR", "GRG", "RGR"]}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="diagonal">
</div>

## Corner Placement

Sprites placed at corners of the composition.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "pos_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_red", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_green", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_blue", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "diagonal_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R..", ".G.", "..B"]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "corner_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R.G", "...", "B.."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "grid_fill", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {"R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green"}, "layers": [{"map": ["RGR", "GRG", "RGR"]}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="corners">
</div>

## Grid Fill Pattern

Checkerboard pattern filling the entire grid.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "pos_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_red", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_green", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_blue", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "diagonal_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R..", ".G.", "..B"]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "corner_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R.G", "...", "B.."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "grid_fill", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {"R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green"}, "layers": [{"map": ["RGR", "GRG", "RGR"]}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="grid">
</div>

## Null Cell Handling

Verifies that null cells (.) are transparent.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "pos_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_red", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_green", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_blue", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "diagonal_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R..", ".G.", "..B"]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "corner_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R.G", "...", "B.."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "grid_fill", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {"R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green"}, "layers": [{"map": ["RGR", "GRG", "RGR"]}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="null_cells">
</div>
